remarks: The powers of the element ` 1 ` give a ring homomorphism from ` ZZ ` to a ring.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jun-2015.)  Obsolete version of ~ mulgrhm as of 12-Jun-2019.  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
mulgghm2OLD.1 $e |- Z = ( CCfld |`s ZZ ) $.
mulgghm2OLD.2 $e |- .x. = ( .g ` R ) $.
mulgghm2OLD.3 $e |- F = ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n .x. .1. ) ) $.
mulgrhmOLD.4 $e |- .1. = ( 1r ` R ) $.
mulgrhmOLD $p |- ( R e. Ring -> F e. ( Z RingHom R ) ) $.
$d .1. n $.
$d .x. n $.
$d R n $.
$d Z n $.
